+[
+  {
+    "LiveFrom": "01/01/2017",

+    "ID": "uploadAdditionalApplications",
+    "Name": "Upload additional applications",
+    "Description": "Upload additional applications",
+    "DisplayOrder": 11,
+    "PreConditionState(s)": "Submitted;Gatekeeping;PREPARE_FOR_HEARING;FINAL_HEARING;CLOSED",
+    "PostConditionState": "*",
+    "SecurityClassification": "Public",
+    "ShowSummary": "Y",
+    "ShowEventNotes": "Y",
+    "EndButtonLabel": "Save and continue",
+    "CallBackURLAboutToSubmitEvent": "${CCD_DEF_CASE_SERVICE_BASE_URL}/callback/upload-additional-applications/about-to-submit",
+    "CallBackURLSubmittedEvent": "${CCD_DEF_CASE_SERVICE_BASE_URL}/callback/upload-additional-applications/submitted",
+    "RetriesTimeoutURLSubmittedEvent": "0"
+  }
+]
